title: 35天，从榜首到默默无闻：人工智能排行榜是残酷的
description: o1 从榜首跌至第 56 位，Claude 3 Opus 跌至第 139 位。
titleZh: 35天，从榜首到默默无闻：人工智能排行榜是残酷的
titleEn: 35 Days, From Top of the Charts to Obscurity: The AI Leaderboard is Brutal
descriptionZh: o1 从榜首跌至第 56 位，Claude 3 Opus 跌至第 139 位。
descriptionEn: o1 plummeted from the top spot to #56, Claude 3 Opus fell to #139. The LMSYS leaderboard reveals a harsh truth: a large model's 'reign at the top' lasts only 35 days! This isn't just technological iteration; it's a dimensional slaughter for all application-layer developers.

title: 没有写一行代码，花270元，烧完1500个请求，他和5岁儿子一周就做出了一个游戏：现在做作业直接“上瘾”……
description: 最终的结果是：“现在我必须把他从学习游戏中拉出来。”

titleEn: Without writing a single line of code, spending 270 yuan and burning through 1500 requests, he and his 5-year-old son made a game in a week: Now homework is directly "addictive"...
descriptionZh: 最终的结果是：“现在我必须把他从学习游戏中拉出来。”
descriptionEn: The final result: "Now I have to pull him away from the learning game."

title: 再见，程序员：硅谷拥抱 AI 编码，Karpathy 宣布 9 级地震已经到来
description: 安德烈·卡帕蒂 (Andrej Karpathy) 令人震惊的推文揭示了编程史上最戏剧性的剧变；
titleZh: 再见，程序员：硅谷拥抱 AI 编码，Karpathy 宣布 9 级地震已经到来
titleEn: Goodbye, Programmers: Silicon Valley Embraces AI Coding, Karpathy Declares a Magnitude-9 Earthquake Has Arrived
descriptionZh: 安德烈·卡帕蒂 (Andrej Karpathy) 令人震惊的推文揭示了编程史上最戏剧性的剧变；
descriptionEn: Andrej Karpathy's shocking tweet unveiled the most dramatic upheaval in programming history; software engineering is experiencing a magnitude-9 earthquake. When Linus Torvalds starts coding with AI, when Rust creator DHH passionately promotes AI programming online, when an Australian sheep farmer drives Silicon Valley elites crazy with 5 lines of code, we must face a harsh reality: the AGI singularity in the programming field has arrived first. While other industries are still debating whether AI will replace humans, programmers have already touched the singularity.
